comments.author: jhoneill
comments.body:
Translation says this is a request for current PowerShell on Server 2003  
Extended support for 2003 ended in July 2015,  and current versions of PowerShell are supported on 2012 R2 and later and not supported on 2012 and earlier.  
Server 2012 is the oldest OS still in extended support, so ideally PowerShell _should_  support that.  
But the number of customers wanting to keep out-of-support OSes in production, **and** add new software to them is so small that it the effort can't be justified.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as answered and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.
